sentences.sCn: 大约有350名代表参加了大会。

sentences.sContent: He talks of travelling less, and delegating more authority to his deputies.
sentences.sCn: 他说要减少旅行，还有要授予他的副手们更多的权力。

words.tran: 代表团；代表的地位；代表制度；代表的派遣

trans.tranOther: someone who has been elected or chosen to speak, vote, or take decisions for a group

trans.tranCn: 委派…为代表； 授给…， 把…委托给…
trans.tranOther: If you delegate duties, responsibilities, or power to someone, you give them those duties, those responsibilities, or that power so that they can act on your behalf
